channel.title: Nez Perce Trail on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Nez Perce Trail on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 180
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 180 - Spencer. The Nez Perce Trail leaves I-15 here.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 180
item.description: I-15 North Exit 180 - Spencer. Spencer is the last town on I-15 north in Idaho. Spencer lies at the base of Monida Pass. the Nez Perce Trail exits I-15 here as well.

item.title: ID-13 South - Nez Perce Trail
item.description: Begin ID-13 south. ID-13 is signed as the Nez Perce Trail and Northwest Passage Scenic Byway.
